TextView.android:text: Donâ€™t Panic is an android app where in by just a single click on the help button provided in the app your current location along with an alert message will be sent to ambulance and the pre-saved contacts that are added by an add contact feature provided within the app. This feature also allows the user to update the existing contacts, delete the contacts and also add new contact at any instance of time. Along with this feature we also provide the additional features in our app that include identifying the disease based on your health symptoms, prescription for general health irregularities, information about the blood banks and also offline first aid videos that help people to save the victim in emergency. There are few people who can neither afford a family doctor nor rush to a doctor for every health issue so here we help such people through our app by providing a minimal prescription for the regular health irregularities.
